__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on '''thunderbird'''! The goal of today's bug day will be to provide better desktop integration with one of the most popular mail clients.

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by changing '''none''' to '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===
During hug days you can also do <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day|5-A-Day]]</nowiki> for this one you can do the following in order to tag your work on the hug day:

* 5-a-day --add-tag hugday-20080828
* Add bugs to 5-a-day as usual
* And when done with hug day run: 5-a-day --remove-tag hugday-20080828
